SkView::F2BIter

SkView::F2BIter Class Reference

#include <SkView.h>

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

 F2BIter (const SkView *parent)
SkView * next ()

Detailed Description

Iterator that will return each of this view's children, in front-to-back order (the order used for clicking). The first call to next() returns the front-most child view. When next() returns nil, there are no more child views.
